Screenshot of a character interaction with the progress indicator highlighted and a callout box. The callout box says "The progress indicator displays how many issues you were able to detect without requiring help from your EIC. After each question, the progress indicator will change to reflect the number of correct answers you have submitted compared to how many correct answers were present in each question. More than one correct answer may exist for each question. While perfect performance is not expected, this indicator can help you determine your level of independence when detecting fraud."
